schema.title: WellboreHoldUpDepth
schema.description: A depth or depth interval where damage to the outer casing / tubing or other material in the pipe or annulus prevents tool passage to the designed drift diameter.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

WellboreID.title: Wellbore
WellboreID.description: Business natural key or code of the Wellbore to which this record belongs

Description.title: Description
Description.description: A remark, comment or generic description.
Description.example: 6.5" BHA Stuck in Hole @ 3900m during November 2025 drilling activity. Twist off @ 3500m

HoldUpDepthStatesID.title: Hold Up Depth States
HoldUpDepthStatesID.description: The life cycle state (status) history the Hold Up Depth has been through.

items.title: Hold Up Depth State
items.description: The lifecycle status history for a Hold Up Depth

EffectiveDateTime.title: Effective Date Time
EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time at which the HoldUpDepth state becomes effective.

TerminationDateTime.title: Termination Date Time
TerminationDateTime.description: The date and time at which the HoldUpDepth state is no longer in effect.

HoldUpDepthStateTypeID.title: Hold Up Depth State Type ID
HoldUpDepthStateTypeID.description: Hold Up Depth State Type ID

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A comment or remark attributed to the Hold Up Depth state.

VerticalMeasurement.title: VerticalMeasurement
VerticalMeasurement.description: The vertical measurement reference for the interval top and base. Either VerticalMeasurement with supplementing type properties or VerticalMeasurementID (an external vertical reference defined in the object VerticalReferenceEntityID) are populated.

HoldUpDepthCategoryID.title: Hold Up Depth Category ID
HoldUpDepthCategoryID.description: Hold Up Depth Category - HUD or Fish

MeasuredDepthTop.title: Measured Depth Top
MeasuredDepthTop.description: Top depth of the Hold Up interval. Should always been known.

MeasuredDepthBase.title: Measured Depth Base
MeasuredDepthBase.description: Base depth of the Hold Up interval. May be NULL when only the Top depth is known.

HoldUpDateTime.title: Hold Up Date/Time
HoldUpDateTime.description: Date/time when hold up depth 1st detected/encountered/reported.

DepthMeasurementTypeID.title: Depth Measurement Type ID
DepthMeasurementTypeID.description: Method used to measure depth of the hold up interval

StuckMethodDescription.title: Stuck method description
StuckMethodDescription.description: Description of how pipe become stuck

TopOuterDiameter.title: Top Outer Diameter
TopOuterDiameter.description: Outer diameter (OD) of the top of the hold up depth

TopInnerDiameter.title: Top Inner Diameter
TopInnerDiameter.description: Inner diameter (ID) of the top of the hold up depth

IsFishingAttempted.title: Is Fishing Attempted
IsFishingAttempted.description: Has a Fishing activity been performed on the HUD

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Other comments for the hold up depth
